attributes.action: Euthanasia Allow to be legal in terminal cases
attributes.additional_details:
Allow for Euthanasia to be allowed within terminal illness cases .
I have had to witness with my family my Grandfather die a painful death due to this law not being in place . You would not allow an animal to go through the same ! He basically drowned on Morphine for a full day and was starved for a few days prior with all medication stopped due to end of life care taking place ! How is this fair for the family watching a loved one go through this pain?
attributes.background: Allow for Euthanasia to be allowed within terminal illness cases

rejection.details:
There’s already a petition about this issue. We cannot accept a new petition when we already have one about a very similar issue.

You are more likely to get action on this issue if you sign and share a single petition.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621810

We've marked your petition as personal because of the information it contains, which you may not want to appear as a rejected petition.
